Literature.Title: Triple-targeting Gram-negative selective antimicrobial peptides capable of disrupting the cell membrane and lipid A biosynthesis
Literature.Author: Postma TM, Liskamp RM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=0.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 789(MIC=0.25µM),Citrobacter freundii DSM 30029(MIC=0.5µM),Shigella sonnei DSM 5570(MIC=0.25µM),Salmonella enterica DSM 17058(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1117(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii AL1851-DelLpxA(MIC=0.25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii Al1852-DelLpxD(MIC=0.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 11729(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 28319(MIC=1µM)
